headline: Fifth Third Debt Raise And Credit Shift Signal Evolving Risk Profile
summary: Fifth Third Bancorp (NasdaqGS:FITB) completed a $2b senior unsecured debt offering, adding fresh long term funding capacity. The bank also announced a leadership transition in its credit organization, with a longstanding chief credit officer set to retire and an internal successor appointed. For you as an investor, the twin updates at Fifth Third Bancorp sit against a backdrop of a $50.22 share price and a 17.5% return over the past year. Over 3 and 5 years, returns of 50.7% and 88.4% show...
